about.heading: About us...
about.text:
With a collective pool of over 50 years experience, Diablo Tattoo has been a trusted name in custom body art, blending the timeless spirit of traditional tattooing with the versatility and creativity of modern styles. Founded on deep roots in classic technique and craftsmanship, the studio has grown into a respected space where artistry, experience, and individuality come together.

Our team brings a combined mastery of every styleâ€”from bold traditional, black and grey, realism, and large-scale custom projects. We approach each tattoo as a unique collaboration, taking the time to understand your ideas and translate them into artwork that reflects both your vision and our seasoned craft.

Despite our long history and high standards, the atmosphere at Diablo Tattoo remains relaxed, friendly, and down-to-earth. We believe great art comes from comfort and trust, so whether you're planning your first tattoo or building on a long-term collection, you'll find a welcoming environment where you can ask questions, explore concepts, and enjoy the process from start to finish.

contact.heading: Get in touch.
contact.description:
Thinking about your next tattoo? Let us know what you have in mind.

Use the form below to tell us about your idea - the style, size, and placement you're considering. The more detail you can give us, the better we can help.

Please attach reference images - whether it's inspiration photos, existing artwork, or your own sketches. This helps our artists understand your vision and provide you with the best advice and most accurate quote.

We'll get back to you as soon as possible to discuss your design and get you booked in with the perfect artist.
